inscription:
Title; Signature; Date
Verso: [Coll. de P. M. Giruls-de St. Germain / No. 207]
markings: [Campo Vacino, Farnese. C.N. 1767.], in black ink, lower right
medium: Graphite, pen and brown ink, ink washes, red chalk, and white heightening
provenance: P. M. Giruls de St. Germain; [John Cassayd-Smith, Minneapolis, 1989; offered at MIA Print and Drawing Sale, April 1989]; Sale, Christie's, London, July 7, 1992, lot 230, BI'd); David Chalfant, Minneapolis, MN, 1993; gave to MIA as anonymous donor
title: View of Campo Vacino, Rome
